title: Rosetta Stone 2.1.4.1A for Mac OS
description:
I had a lot of trouble getting Rosetta Stone to open my Pashto CD. This App does the trick. It is the Rosetta Stone 2.1.4.1A CD. The OSX version gives me all sorts of pains, but the Classic version doesn&#039;t ask any questions like what&#039;s the password or access key or anything else I don&#039;t know the answer to. If you are a mac user and have trouble opening your version 2 language disk (like Farsi), this is the app for you.

This is my first torrent though so I dunno if I did it right.
